title: Switch PTY Manager to tmux Control Mode for Terminal Scrollback

comment:
REVIEW: CR-081-VAR-001 v0.1 -- COMPLIANT. Recommend for approval.

FRONTMATTER:
- title: "Switch PTY Manager to tmux Control Mode for Terminal Scrollback" -- present and non-empty.
- revision_summary: "Initial draft" -- acceptable for v0.1 of a self-authorizing executable document per SOP-001 Section 5.1.

SOP-004 SECTION 9A.3 REQUIRED CONTENT -- all sections present and complete:
1. Variance Identification: Parent=CR-081 (verified IN_EXECUTION at v1.1), Affected Item=EI-4/Scope expansion, Type=Type 1.
2. Detailed Description: Clearly states expected vs. actual. Documents four failed workaround approaches (DECSTBM stripping, extended scroll regions, SU-to-newline conversion, resize suppression) with technical rationale for each failure.
3. Root Cause: "Scope Error" -- tmux normal attach performs lossy viewport rendering that destroys scrollback semantics. Control mode bypasses rendering entirely.
4. Variance Type: "Scope Error" correctly selected from SOP-004 enumerated list with sound justification.
5. Impact Assessment with Scope Handoff per 9A.5: (a) Accomplished in parent: EI-1 through EI-3 passing with specific evidence cited. (b) VAR absorbs: EI-4 failure plus scope expansion for control mode implementation (pty_manager rewrite, useHubConnection simplification, new unit tests). (c) Explicit confirmation: "No scope items are lost."
6. Proposed Resolution: Technically detailed -- explains control mode protocol, lists per-file changes at function level, identifies additions, modifications, and removals.
7. Resolution EIs: Four EIs covering backend rewrite, frontend simplification, unit tests, and manual verification -- logical progression with complete coverage.

TYPE 1 CLASSIFICATION: Correct per SOP-004 9A.2. Parent CR-081 EI-4 (manual verification) cannot pass without scrollback working. Full VAR closure is required before parent can close.

PLACEHOLDER CHECK: No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX in pre-approved content. Executable block editable fields ([EXECUTION_SUMMARY], [Pass/Fail], [PERFORMER], [DATE]) are correctly blank per SOP-004 Section 4.1.

FORMATTING/ERRORS: No typos found. Section numbering sequential (1-9). Markdown tables well-formed. Code blocks properly fenced. Consistent formatting throughout.

REFERENCES: SOP-004, CR-081, CR-080, SOP-002 -- all relevant and valid.

POST-REVIEW: CR-081-VAR-001 v1.2 -- NON-COMPLIANT. Requesting updates.

FRONTMATTER:
- title: "Switch PTY Manager to tmux Control Mode for Terminal Scrollback" -- present and non-empty.
- revision_summary: "EI-4 manual verification complete — all resolution items Pass" -- present and descriptive for a self-authorizing executable document.

PRE-APPROVED CONTENT INTEGRITY (Sections 1-6, 9): Verified unchanged from pre-reviewed v0.1. All sections intact: Variance Identification, Detailed Description, Root Cause, Variance Type, Impact Assessment, Proposed Resolution, References.

EXECUTABLE BLOCK (Section 7 - Resolution Work):
- EI-1: Pass. Narrative describes pty_manager.py rewrite with specific function-level detail (attach, read loop, write, resize, decoders). Evidence sufficient.
- EI-2: Pass. Narrative lists specific removals (EXTEND_SCROLL_REGION_RE, SCROLL_UP_RE, scrollback parameter, resizePending Map, DA filtering) and retentions. File reduced 297 to 236 lines. Evidence sufficient.
- EI-3: Pass. 30 unit tests across 3 classes (TestDecodeOctal 12, TestDecodeControlOutput 11, TestEncodeSendKeys 7). All pass. 10 existing UAT tests pass. Evidence sufficient.
- EI-4: Pass. Lead verified input, scrollback, and resize. Three duplication issues found and fixed during verification. Evidence sufficient.
- Resolution Comments: Two entries documenting execution flow and debugging iterations. Consistent with EI narratives. Final test count 32 (2 added during EI-4 debugging).

DEFICIENCY FOUND:

Section 8 (VAR Closure): The closure table contains placeholder content: [RESOLUTION_DETAILS], [OUTCOME], [PERFORMER], [DATE]. Per SOP-004 Section 9A.3, VAR content must include "VAR Closure: Final outcome and disposition." All four resolution EIs are Pass and the document has been routed for post-review, but the closure section has not been filled in. This is a required field.

ACTION REQUIRED: Complete Section 8 (VAR Closure) with actual values -- resolution details narrative, outcome, performer, and date -- then re-route for post-review.

FORMATTING/ERRORS: No typos found. Section numbering correct (1-9). Markdown tables well-formed. Comment blocks appropriate. Consistent formatting throughout.

PLACEHOLDER CHECK: FAIL -- Section 8 contains [RESOLUTION_DETAILS], [OUTCOME], [PERFORMER], [DATE].

POST-REVIEW (Round 2): CR-081-VAR-001 v1.2 -- COMPLIANT. Recommend for approval.

FRONTMATTER:
- title: "Switch PTY Manager to tmux Control Mode for Terminal Scrollback" -- present and non-empty.
- revision_summary: "Section 8 closure completed per QA post-review feedback" -- present, descriptive, acceptable for self-authorizing executable document.

PRE-APPROVED CONTENT INTEGRITY (Sections 1-6, 9): Verified unchanged from pre-reviewed v0.1 and previous post-review round. All sections intact.

EXECUTABLE BLOCK (Section 7 - Resolution Work):
- EI-1: Pass. pty_manager.py rewrite -- attach(), _read_loop(), _decode_octal(), _decode_control_output(), _encode_send_keys(), write(), resize(). Public API unchanged. Evidence sufficient.
- EI-2: Pass. useHubConnection.ts simplified -- removed EXTEND_SCROLL_REGION_RE, SCROLL_UP_RE, scrollback param, resizePending Map, DA filtering. Kept STRIP_MODES_RE, STRIP_CLEAR_SCROLLBACK_RE. 297 to 236 lines. Evidence sufficient.
- EI-3: Pass. 30 unit tests (TestDecodeOctal 12, TestDecodeControlOutput 11, TestEncodeSendKeys 7), all passing. 10 existing UAT tests pass. Evidence sufficient.
- EI-4: Pass. Lead verified input, scrollback, resize. Three duplication issues found and fixed. Evidence sufficient.
- Resolution Comments: Two entries consistent with EI narratives. Final count 32 tests (2 added during EI-4 debugging).

PREVIOUS DEFICIENCY RESOLVED:
Section 8 (VAR Closure) now contains actual values:
- Details: Summarizes control mode rewrite, GUI simplification, re-render fix, 32 unit tests, manual verification.
- Outcome: "Resolved — all EIs Pass"
- Performed By: "claude - 2026-02-15"
Placeholders from v1.2 Round 1 are fully replaced. Deficiency cleared.

SOP-004 SECTION 10 POST-REVIEW REQUIREMENTS:
1. Execution Complete: All 4 EIs Pass -- SATISFIED.
2. Blocking VARs Resolved: No nested VARs -- N/A, SATISFIED.
3. Documentation Approved: No controlled documents modified under VAR -- N/A, SATISFIED.
4. Evidence Documented: All EIs have execution summaries with verifiable evidence -- SATISFIED.

PARENT CHECK: CR-081 confirmed IN_EXECUTION at v1.1 -- consistent with Type 1 VAR.

PLACEHOLDER CHECK: None found. No TBD, TODO, FIXME, XXX, or bracket placeholders in document.

FORMATTING/ERRORS: No typos. Section numbering correct (1-9). Markdown tables well-formed. Consistent formatting throughout.
